description: Apart from initial term, composite numbers with property that concatenation of prime factors is a palindrome.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a046447 n = a046447_list !! (n-1)a046447_list = 1 : filter f [1..] where   f x = length ps > 1 && ps' == reverse ps'         where ps' = concatMap show ps; ps = a027746_row x-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 02 2014(Python)from sympy import factorint, isprimeA046447_list = [1]for n in range(4,10**6):....if not isprime(n):........s = ''.join([str(p)*e for p,e in sorted(factorint(n).items())])........if s == s[::-1]:............A046447_list.append(n) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 03 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jul 15 1998
